Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Ne shikhweshiakhwo khubandu be imbeli wuwe omukanda kweliyie okhurula mwikulu ne shikhwali beshia tawe
Lwali butswa oluyoka lulala, mana bo nibanyisibwa
Abaane, ebeelelela Abandu banje Omurumwa yesiyesi shiyabetselaga tawe okhula bamubayile
Koo shibalolangakhwo emikanda chinga chakhwasishia imbeli wabu. Abo toto shibalibakalushila tawe
Ne toto boosi balikhung’asibwa barerwe imbeli wefu
Ne eshimanyisio khubo-liloba [eliuma] liafwa khulilamusinjia mana khuchesemwo imele yabaliitsanga
Ne nikhukasiamwo emikunda chie tsitende nende tsizabibu ne nikhukasiamwo tsisebele
Kho balie khubiamo bie nende ake emikhono chiabu chilakholele tawe, koo shibakhupanga orio tawe
Oluyali nilwa Nyasaye waloonga eshisatsa	neshikhasi	bioosi khubimelanga mwiloba nende enywe abeene nende ebiabalamanyile tawe
Ne eshilo neshimanyisio shindi khubo, olwa khurusinjiamwo eshiteere nabo baba mushiilima
Ne eliuba lichendanga khushichelo shalio esho nisho eshichelo shia Nyasaye Owamaani Omumanyi muno
Ne Omwesi khwakukasilia ebichelo okhula okhukalukha shingala kwali shinga likhamari liumile
Eliuba shiniliula khumwesi nohomba eshilo okhubura eshitere nabo biosi bibotokhananga khutsinjila tsiabio
Ne ni eshimanyisio khubo mbu efwe khwachinga olwibulo lwabu musafina yetsula
Ne nikhwabalonjela okhurula khwifwani eyo ebiabarakanga
Ne nikhwenya nikhubayibisia ne abulaho ubakhoonya nohomba shibahabinwa tawe
Halali tsimbabaasi tsirulanga khwifwe nende omwikhoyo kwebise bititi
Ne nibaboolelwa mbu; “mwilinde nende khukali imbeli wenyu nende kali inyuma wenyu mwakhaba murio mwanyoola okhubeelwa tsimbabaasi.”
Ne ishimanyisio shiosi shiosi shia Nyasaye wabu Omulesi nishiboolela shibabukulangamwo oluchendo tawe
Ne nibaboolelwa mbu; “rusie khubilia bia Nyasaye wenyu abakabile ,abakhayi baboolelenga Abasuubili mbu; ‘‘koo khubalisie biala ba Nyasaye niyenya nabalisia? toto enywe muli mubukori bwabulafu.”
Ne baboolanga mbu; “kamukhulakanga kano kalirulila lina nimuli toto abahabwene.”
Shibalindanga halali oluyoka lulala butwsa lulibabukula nabo nibali mukhusolana
Mana shibalinyoola okhulaamila nohomba shibalikalukha khubandu babu tawe
Na olwa olwika lulikhupwa balirula mubilindwa nibelushila ewa Nyasaye wabu Omulesi
Baliboola mbu; “abayie! wina ukhulamusiyie	olwakhubeele nikhukonele, kano niko kayalaka Omunji wetsimbabaasi ne Abarumwa baboola katoto.”
Ne shiluliba halali oluyoka lulala butwsa mana boosi balikhung’asibwa imbeli wefu
Mana olwa lelo abulaho yesiyesi olikholelwa	amabii	kosikosi ne shimulirungwa halali kalia kamwakholaga
Toto Abandu bo mwikulu lelo bali khumilimo nibakonele (khubusangafu)
Bo nende abakhaye babu nibali mubinikha bayeshele khubisaala biobwokhola
Balinyolamwo tsimbia tsiosi tsiebiamo, nebalinyoolamwo buli eshiabeenya
“Omulembe,” likhuwa lirula khu Nyasaye Omulesi Wobukoosia muno
Ne enywe abetsimbii mwiyawule olwalelo
Koo shindalakana ninanyu mbu enywe Abandu mulalaama Shetani tawe , toto ye ni Omusuku wenyu owabulafu
Ni mbu munaame esie ino niyo injila ingololofu
No khubwatoto ye yakosia omukanda omukhongo mwinywe , koo shimwaparangakhwo tawe
Mana ino niyo Jahanam yamwalakungwa
Injilemwo lelo shingala mwakhayanga
Olwa lelo khutimbia eminwa chiabu ne imikhono chiabu chiboole ninafu ne ibilenje biabu birusie obuloli khu kalia kabakholanga
Ne khwenyanga khwakhatimbiyie tsimoni tsiabu baba nibashilanila injila halali bakhalutsi barie
Ne	khwenyanga khwakhabakalukhaniye ifwani abali hao butswa, mana shibakhanyalile okhutsia nohomba okhukalukha tawe
Ne wakhukofusia khumukalusinjia inyuma mubulonji mana koo shibakhaparangakhwo
Ne shikhwamwechesia [Muhammad] tsinyimbo tawe ne kano shikenyekhana khuye tawe, shino ni eshitsulisio nende Ikurani iretsanga abulafu
Khulwo khwikanyilisilia ushili omulamu ne likhuwa libure khubakhayi
Ko shibalolanga mbu khwabaloonjela okhurulana khumilimo chie mikhono chiefu tsisolo tsiemiruko, etsia barukanga
Ne nikhubanguyisilia etsindi mutsisolo etso tsiabaninangakhwo ne etsindi batsiliitsaanga
Ne bo banyoolanga mutsisolo etso obukhonyi nende ebinywebwa kho mana shibakhupanga orio tawe
Ne batila Abanyasaye bandi habundu wa Nyasaye mbu khobanyoole obukhoonyi
Shibalinyala okhubakhonya halali abo nibo baliba Abasikari babu olwabali khwitsila
Manaamakhuwakabukalakhubelesia tawe, toto efwe khwamanya kabafisanga nende kabaretsaanga habulafu
Ne Omundu shalolanga mbu khwamuloonga okhurulana nende indonyande ya amatsi kolwibulo mana toto ye niye omuseeri wahabulafu
Ne alakhuchelasilia naye yebilila okhulongwa khukhwe -mana naboola mbu : “ ni wina oyo ulilamusia ebikumba nibimalile okhubulungukha?”
Boola mbu; “ alibilamusia ulia wabiloonga olwokhuranjilila, naye ni Omumanyi muno wabuli okhuloonga khwosi”
Ulia wabakholela okhunyoola omulilo okhurula khumusala omubisi mana nimunyoola okhubwana omulilo okhurulana ninakwo
Koo waloonga likulu nende eshialo shanyala okhulonga bafwana ninabo? Khulwa shina naye niye Omuloonji Omukhongo Owamachesi muno
Toto likhuwa lilie niyenya eshindu ashiboolela butswa mbu: “ ba’’ ni shiba
Mana yatswenukha ulia wobwami bwa buli eshindu buli mumukhono kukwe, ne ewuwe niwo amulikalusibwa
Nditsuba khubemaanga khulunyaali
Nende khubalia bakaninjia amabii
Nende khubalia basoomanga obwitsulisio
Toto Nyasaye wenyu nimulala butswa
Nyasaye Omulesi welikulu nende eshialo nende ebili hakari wabio. Ne ni Nyasaye Omulesi we ebukwe tsiosi
Toto efwe khwarona likulu liahambi khutsing’ining’ini
Khulwokhulinda okhurulana nende buli Shetani Omukhayi
Balanyoola okhuwulila ebilonje bioluyali, ne baloondungwayo buli mumbeka
Baloondungwa ne bali nende eshinyasio shilawa
Halali ulia upusulanga eshindu eshititi , ne mana shimulondangakhwo eshikhupo shimesamesanga
Barebekhwo mbu koo abo ni baloongwa okhuloongwa okhutinyu muno okhushila ebilonje bindi biakhwaloonga? Toto efwe khwabaloonga okhurulana khuliloba litilanga
Owukanga nabo bakholanga omubayo
Ne nibetsulisibwa shibetsulilanga tawe
Ne nibalola eshimanyisio nibakhola omubayo
Ne baboola mbu: “kano shinishiosi shiosi tawe halali ni obulosi butswa buli habulafu.”
Mbunikhufwanikhumalileokhubaliloba nende ebikumba, kho toto khulilamusibwa
Kata bapapa befu bakhale
Boola mbu: “mmm! nanyu nimuli batutuyibwe .”
Eyo oluyoka lulikhupwa lulala butswa, ni hawo niwo abalilola
Baliboola mbu: “ abayiee, ino niyo inyanga yomurungo.”
Ino niyo inyanga yeyindukho yamwakhayanga
Bakhung’asie boosi bakhola amabii nende abakhasi babu nende balia boosi babalaamanga
Nibakhaya okhulaama Nyasaye bachomie khunjila yomulilo kwa Jahannam
Mana mubeemie. Totobo balarebwa
“Mubeele murie? Shichila shina nimulakhoonyana?”
Halali olwalelo balaloonda lilako
Balihengana abeene khubeene nibarebana
Baliboola mbu: “ toto enywe mwakhwitsilanga okhurula omukhono omulunji”
Balibakalusia mbu: “Halali enywe abeene shimwali Abasuubili tawe.”
“Efwe shikhwali nobunyali khwinywe tawe halali enywe abeene mwali abakori”
Mana omuse kwa Nyasaye wefu Omulesi kumalile okhubura. Toto efwe khulapila butswa eshinyasio
Khwabakosia eshichila mbu fwesi khwali abakori
Toto abo inyanga eyo balisaanga halala mushinyasio
Endio nilwakhulikholela Abamabii
Olwa baboolelungwa mbu: “abulaho Nyasaye ulaamwa khubwatoto halali Nyasaye Mulala butswa- besuunganga
Baboolanga mbu efwe khuleshesa Abanyasaye befu okhubeela Omukaasi wetsinyimbo wuno Omulalu
Halali ye yetsa khubwatoto ne afuchilisania nende Abarumwa
Toto enywe mulipila eshinyasio eshilulu
Ne shimulirungwa tawe halali kalia akamwakholanga
Halali Abasumba ba Nyasaye abalobole
Abo nibo balinyoola omukabo omubiishe
Ebiamo , nabo balihebwa oluyali
Mumikunda chobwokholo
Baliba khubisaala nibahengane
Balibotokhanilibwa eshisanda shieshinywebwa shieyisebele
Eshinywebwa eshilafu , eshimilimili khu ushinywa
Shibula obubii , nohomba shishibameesia tawe
Ne baliba nende Abakhasi betsimoni tsietsisoni tsindayi
Abakhasi shinga amabuyu kaliindwa
Baliinjila bachake , okhureebana abeene khubeene
Aliboola omubooli mulala mubo: “toto esie ndali nende Omwitsa.”
Yambolelanga mbu: “lano ewe ulimubafuchililanga?”
‘‘Mbu nikhufwa khwaba liloba nende ebikumba, mbu khulirungwa mana khwabalwa?’’
Aliboola mbu: “ laano enywe mulola murie?”
Mana alimuhenga kho alimulola hakari wa Jahannam
Aliboola mbu: “wallahi, Nyasaye mulala wali ahambi okhungosia.”
Tsikhayanga okhuba tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wanje omulesi ndakhabeele mubalia abenjisibwamwo
Koo! Efwe shikhulifwa tawe
Halali okhufwa khwefu khwokhuranga, nafu shikhulinyoola eshinyasio tawe
Toto	khuno	nikho	okhubura okhukhongo
Ne	shinga kano, nikabakhole balia bakhola
Koo okhubukanilwa endi shinokhulayi nohomba omusaala kwa Zaquum
Toto efwe khwakukhola okhuba eshinyasio khubalia abamabii
Toto oko ni omusaala kurulanga hakari wa Jahannamu
Ebibuli bie biamo biakwo bili shinga omurwe kwa mashetani
Toto abo balilia ebiamo ebo mana betsusie tsinda tsiabu
Mana khu ako belesibwe amaatsi kayile karabachila
Mana obwatoto amakalushilo kabu kaliba Jahannam
Toto bo banyoola Basabwe nibakora
Nabo nibakhola lwangu okhuloonda amaseenelo kabu
Ne khubwatoto bamala okhukora imbeli wabu Abandu bakhale abaanji
Ne toto efwe khwabarumila abekanyilisi
Mana henga olole shingala indukho yabalia ebekanyilisibwa
Halali Abasumba ba Nyasaye abalobole
Ne toto Nuhu Yakhulaanga , ne efwe khuli abalayi po abafuchililanga
Ne nikhumuhabina ye halala nende Abandu be okhurulana nende amasila amakhongo
Mana nikhukhola olwibulo lulwe okhutoong’a
Mana nikhulekha ifuma indayi khubetsa inyuma wuwe
Omuleembe kube khu Nuhu mushialo shioosi
Toto endio nilwakhurunganga abakholi bamalayi
Toto ye ali Mubasumba befu Abasuubili
Mana Abandi abo nikhubasishia mumatsi
Ne toto Ibrahim yali mumukaanda kukwe
Olwa yetsela Nyasaye wuwe Omulesi nende Omwoyo kukwe kwoosi
Olwa yaboolela Papa wuwe nende Abandu bebe mbu: “nishina shiamulamaanga?”
Eminyasaye chiobubeyi echilali Nyasaye nichiamwenyanga?”
‘‘Mupariranga shina Nyasaye Omulesi webilonje bioosi?”
Mana nasitia tsimoni okhuhenga tsing’ining’ini
Naboola mbu: “toto esie endwala.”
Nabo nibamulekha nibamufutarira omukongo
Mana nabwondela Eminyasaye chiabu. Nachiboolela mbu: “shichila shina nimulaliitsanga?’’
‘‘Mubeele murie amulalomalomanga tawe?’’
Mana nachikalukhanila nachikhupa nomukhono omulunji
Mana nibamwitsila lwangu lwangu
Naboola mbu: “ enywe mulaamanga ebindu bia mwiraanyanga abeene?”
Ne Nyasaye niye wabaloonga halala nende akamukholanga ako
Nenibaboola mbu mumumbashile eshiumbashe mana mumusukune mumulilo
Benya okhumukholela amabii halali nikhubakhola bo okhuba bahasi
Ne naboola mbu : “ toto esie ewuya enzia ewa Nyasaye wanje Omulesi, ye alalunjisia”
Ewe Nyasaye wanje Omulesi, mbelesie ulia uli mubakholi bamalayi
Mana nikhumusubisia Omwana Omwihotselefu

Olwa yoola eshichelo shiokhuchenda ninaye yamuboolela mbu: “ewe mwana wanje , toto esie endutsi mumaloro mbu ekhusinzanga, kho hengamwo olola orie?” naboola mbu: “ ewe papa wanje, khola shinga olomesibungwa witsa okhunyoola Nyasaye nachama nendi mubalia befwiila”
Kho boosi babili olwa behotselesia , mana namukonelia obweni
Nikhumulanga mbu : “ewe Ibrahim!”
Omalileokhukholahabwenikhumaloro ako, toto endio nilwakhurunganga Abakholi bamalayi
Toto kano ni amatemo kali habulafu
Mana nikhumuhelesia eshisinzo shioluyali
Mana nikhuleshela ifuma indayi khubetsa inyuma
Omulembe kube khu Ibrahim
Endio nilwakhurunganga Abakholi bamalayi
Toto ye ali Mubandu befu basuubila
Ne nikhumusuubisia okhwibulwa khwa Is’haaq, naye ni Omurumwa womubandu Abalayi
Mana nikhumuhelesia tsimbabaasi ye nende Is’haaq. Ne mulwibulo lwabu nibarulamwo Abandu abalayi nende balia bakhola amabii khumioyo chiabu habulafu
Netoto khwakholela obulayi Musa nende Harun
Nikhumuhabina halala nende Abandu babu okhurulana nende obutinyu obukhongo
Mana nikhubahabina nibaba nibo abashila
Ne nikhuhelesia babili abo eshitabu shinoosinjia
Mana	nikhubalunjisia	khunjila ingololofu
Mana nikhubaleshela ifuma indayi khubalia betsa inyuma wabu
Omulembe kube khu Musa nende Harun
Toto endio nilwakhurunganga balia abalayi
Toto babili abo bali Mubasumba befu abalayi
Ne toto Elyas yali Mubarumwa
Olwa yaboolela Abandu bebe mbu: “shimuritsanga tawe?”
Mulaamanga Baal ( eshimoosi shieidhahabu) ne mulekha omuloonji mwene
Nyasaye Omulesi wenyu nende wa bapapa benyu bakhale
Mana nibamuyingasia. Ne toto balikhung’asibwa (mumulilo)
Halali	Abasumba	ba	Nyasaye Abatswunulwa
Mana nikhubaleshela ifuma indayi khubalia betsa inyuma wabu
Omulembe kube khu Ilyas
Toto endio nilwakhurunganga balia Abalayi
Toto ye ali Mubasumba befu Abasuubila
Ne toto Luti ali Mubarumwa
Olwa khwamuhabina halala nende Abandu baye boosi
Halali Omukhasi omushiele owali mubatong’a inyuma
Mana nikhusishia abandi abo
Ne toto enywe mubaburangakhwo mumabwibwi
Nende	eshilo,	mana	kho shimukharetsangakhwo mubwongo tawe
Ne toto Yunus yali mulala khubarumwa
Olwa yelushila muliaro litsule
Mana nibasanjilana mumakhuwa, mana nikamukwiila
Mana inyeni nimumila naye nali ufunaanibwa
Ne akhayanga okhuba mubalia abetsoominjia Nyasaye
Yakhamenyele munda mwayo okhuula inyanga yokhulamusibwa mubafu
Mana nikhumusukuna khulukuku, naye nali omulwale
Nenikhumumesilia omumela kwelihondo
Ne khwamuruma khubandu iyelefu imia ndala nohomba bashilaho awo
Mana nibasuubila nenikhubara mubwokholo okhula okhufwa khwabu
Ne bareebe mbu: “ Nyasaye wuwo niye uli nende Abana abakhana nabo babe nende Abana abasiani
Nohomba khwaloonga Abamalaika okhuba beshikhasi nabo nibalola
Ne toto manya mbu khububeyi bwabu baboolanga mbu
“Nyasaye yebula” ne toto obo ni obubeyi
Oh, yalobola Abana beshikhana okhushila beshisiani
Baane mulimurie? Mubusinjia murie
Ohh shimuparangakhwo tawe
Nohomba muli nende eshifune shiatoto
Mana nakharerekhwo eshitabu shienyu (itaurati) nikali mbu muboolanga obwatoto
Ne baraho okhwinjilana khwolwikho hakari waye nende Amajini, ne Amajini kamala okhumanya mbu toto (baboolanga bario) balikhung’asibwa (mumililo)
Oluyali ni lwa Nyasaye , Nyasaye	nomutswenufu	muno khukabamuchishilanga
Halali Abasumba ba Nyasaye Abatswenufu
Mana enywe nende abamulamanga
Shimunyala okhubakosia tawe
Halali ulia ulinjila mumulilo
Ne habulaho yesiyesi mwifwe halali alinende habundu wuwe amanyikhane
Ne toto efwe nefwe khwemaanga olunyaali
Ne toto nefwe betsoominjia
Ne baliho balia baboolanga mbu
‘‘Khubeetsangakhwo nende ametsulisio ka Abandu bakhale (bebitabu)
Toto khwakhabeele Abasumba ba Nyasaye Abatswenufu.’’
Halali	(olwashitabu	shiabetsela) bashikhaya mana hambi hano nibalole
Ne toto likhuwa liefu liamala okhuranjilila khubasumba befu Abarumwa
Mbu abo toto nibo balihabinwa
Ne omukanda kwefu kwabalwani niko kulishila
Kho baleshe butswa khubise ebititi
Ne bahenje butswa, ahambi hano balitsa okhumanya
Koo eshinyasio shia Nyasaye nishio shiabayungubasinjia
Kho eshinyasio olwashilibeshela mushikuri, iliba itsuli imbi khubalia bekanyilisibwa
Kho baleshesa khubise bititi
Ne bahenje butswa nabo balitsa okhumanya
Nyasaye Omulesi nomutswenufu muno okhurulana khukabamuchishilanga
Ne omulembe kube Khubarumwa
Ne oluyali lwoosi nilwa Nyasaye Omulesi wabiloonje bioosi
Swad. Nditsuba khu Ikurani eyili nende ametsulisio
Halali Abakhayi bali mwikhwilola nende obuyingani
Ni emikanda chinga chiakhwasishia imbeli wabu niboopa obuyoka , ne ebise biokhuwonibwa biali biburire
Ne bawuka mbu Omwikanyilisi okhurula mubo okhubetsela , mana nibaboola mbu: “uno ni Omulosi Omubeyi.”
Eh! akholele Abanyasaye okhuba Nyasaye mulala yenyene! Toto kano ni amakhuwa khokhuchenyia
Mana Abakhongo babu nibarula nibababoolela mbu: “mutsie mana mutinyesa Khubanyasaye benyu, toto endio nilwakenyekhana.”
Efwe shikhwawulilakhwo kano mushima shiefu shiokhumalilikha tawe, ne kano shineshindu tawe halali ni obuchishi butswa
Mbu niye butswa weshilibwa amekanyilisio mwifwe. Halali abo bali nende eshibeyibeyi khu amekanyilisio kanje, ne mana bashili okhupila eshinyasio shianje
Nohomba bali nende ebiachi bietsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi, Owa amani Khakaba
Nohomba bo bali nende obwami bwomwikulu nende khushialo nende ebili hakari wabio? Khomana banine tsinjila tsiokhutsia eyo
Oko niko omukanda kwabalwani kulishilwa mumikanda chilia chilishilwa
Bayingana inyuma wabu Abandu ba Nuhu, nende babu A’di nende Firaun owali nende ebiumbashe
Nende Thamud nende Abandu ba Luti nende Abandu bomumutsuru. Echo nichio emikanda
Abo boosi bayingasia Abarumwa mana nibakhoyeshela eshinyasio
Ne bano shiabalindangasa ni oluyoka lulala butswa olulali ehale tawe
Nabo baboolanga mbu: “Nyasaye wefu Omulesi khurerere eshinyasio shiefu inyanga yeyindukho nishili okhuula.”
Wisumilisie khukababoolanga ako, ne witsulile Omusumba wefu Daudi Owa amani. Toto ye yali omunji wokhusaba eshileshelo
Netoto khwahotselesia ebikulu halala ninaye nibitsoomia ingolobe nende mumabwibwi halala ninaye
Ne kata amayoni kakhung’asibwa emikanda nemikanda, koosi kali amehotselefu khuye
Ne nikhumeta amani obwami bubwe, ne nikhumuwa amachesi nende obumanyi bwokhubusia omuse
Ne koo wawulikhwo olukano lwabasoolani olwa bekalilwa okhwinjila munzu

Olwa benjila wa Daudi , naye nabaria, nibaboola mbu: “olaria tawe, efwe khuli abasoolani babili, mulala wefu akosele owashie, mana okhukabukhasie khubwatoto , ne olakwila elubeka tawe, ne okhulunjisie khunjila yo bwatoto

Toto uno ni Omusiani wefu, ali nende amakondi amakhasi amakhumi tisa nende tisa, nasi endisa nende likondi lilalasa lieshikhasi, mana aboolanga mbu :“mbelesie elilio elo ekhuruchile” (nasi shindenya tawe) ne yashilile khumakhuwa

Toto ye akholele obubii okhusaba likondi lilio okhumeta khukeke, netoto abeyisanga abanji bakholelanga obubii khubeene, halali balia basuubila mana nibakhola amalayi nenibatiti mubo. Mana Daudi nalola mbu khumukholeele amatemo, nasaba eshileshelo khu Nyasaye wuwe, mana nakwa hasi okhwihotselesia khu Nyasaye wuwe nende okhumukalushila
Mana nikhumuleshela ako, netoto ye alinende eshisaala eshikhongo nende habundu halayi alikalukha khwifwe

Ewe Daudi toto efwe khwakhukhola okhuba omulindi wefu khushialo, kho khalaka emise chia Abandu khubwatoto ne olalonda obwikombi bwomwoyo bwakhukosia khunjila ya Nyasaye , toto balia balekha injila ya Nyasaye abo balinyoola eshinyasio eshilulu khulwa okhubula oluchendo khwabu muyinyanga yokhubalilwa
Ne shiwalonga likulu nende eshialo nende ebili hakari wabio eshikhaya tawe. Ako ni amaparo kabakhayi. Bali nende eshinyasio eshilulu Abakhayi abo mumulilo kubalinyoola
Nohomba khukhole balia basubila babe shinga balia bakholanga amabii khushialo, nohomba khukhole abaria Nyasaye shinga abetsimbii
Eshitabu shino shakhwakhwishilia ewe shilimwo tsimbabaasi tsinyinji, kho banyoole okhupaara mutsinyaali tsiashio, ne bobwoongo banyoole okhuwulila
Ne khwahelesia Dawudi Suleiman yali Omusumba omulayi muno, toto ye yali omunji wokhukalushila Nyasaye
Olwa yarumilwa ingolobe tsifarasi tsiwulelanga nitsiemele,	tsinyangu okhutsunukha
Mana naboola mbu : “esie ndachama ebindu ebilayi khulwa okhwitsulila Nyasaye wanje, mana (tsifarasi etso) nitsifisa inyuma weshikalilo. (Suleiman niyenya mbu atsilole khandi)
Mutsikalusie khwisie , mana nachaka okhutsitilakhwo mwikosi nende khubilenje
Mana nikhura Suleiman mumatemo, nenikhura omubili khushisaala shishie, mana nakalukha okhusaba eshileshelo
Naboola mbu: “Nyasaye wanje undeshele ne umbelesie obwaami bwo mundu wundi alalinyoola inyuma wanje tawe, toto ewe newe Omuwani.’’
Mana nikhukhola omuyeka okhumurumushila,	kwachendanga khumunwa kukwe, hosi hosi ayenya okhuula
Mana nikhukhola amashetani okhumurumushila, koosi kombakhanga nende keyibilanga
Nende abaandi boboyungwa khuminyororo
Shino ni eshihanwa shiefu, kho mana rusia nohomba shitiile, shibula eshichelo
Ne toto ye ali nende oluyali okhwinjisibwa ewefu, nende habundu halayi muno wokhukalukha
Ne yitsulila Omusumba wefu Ayub, olwa yalanga Nyasaye wuwe mbu: “ toto esie shetani yanderere obusinyifu nende obusandi.”
Nyasaye namuboolela mbu : “sieba hasi eshilenje shishio (isebele nirundukha hasi awo) kho amatsi amanyifu ko khwisinga wisinje ngako, nende kokhunywa onywe.”
Mana nikhumuhelesia Abandu bebe nende abandi shinga abo, nende tsimbabaasi tsirula khwifwe, nende eshitsulisio khubaandu bobwongo

Ne bukula mumukhono kukwo olusaala , omukhupile (omukhaye wuwo khulwokhwitsuba khwa wetsuba- khumabii kayakhola) ne olafunaka eshitsubo tawe. Toto kwamunyoola nali Omwifwiili Omusumba Omulayi, toto yali Omwisumilisi muno
Ne yitsulila Omusumba wefu Ibrahim nende Is’haaq nende Yaqub bali ba amaani nende amachesi
Toto efwe khwabalobola khulikhuwa lilayi muno liokhwitsulila mwikulu
Ne toto abo bali khwifwe Mubandu abalobole abalayi
Ne yitsulila Ismail nende Alyasa nende dhil kifli ne abo boosi bali Mubandu abalayi
Kano ni ametsulisio ne toto bwene balia baria Nyasaye habundu wabu wokhukalukha aliba alayi muno
Emikunda chomwikulu echilaliwa, chilikulwa emiliango shichila bo
Omo baliyiekhamwo nibalaanga ebiamo ebinji nende ebinywebwa ebilayi po
Ne baliba nabakhaye babu abasangasia tsimoni , abolubaka lulala
Kano niko kamwalakwa [okhunyoola] inyanga yokhubalwa
Toto kuno niko umukabo kwefu okulawetsaanga tawe
Endio nilwakaliba netoto balia baruumanga olwakho amakalushilo kabu kaliba amabii
Jahannam balinjilamwo, nabo ni obukono obubii muno bwakhukonakhwo
Endio nilwakaliba mana banywemwo amatsi komulilo nende kamafila
Nende ebinyasio bindi ngabino ebinji
Kuno niko omukanda kulinjila halala ninanyu, balibula okhwinjisibwa obulayi, toto abo balinjila mumulilo
Baliboola mbu : “enywe nenywe mubula amwinjila halayi, nenywe mwachila nikhunyoola eshinyasio, kho muli Abandu ababii muno.”
Baliboola mbu: “ Nyasaye wefu balia bachila nikhunyoola kano bameete eshinyasio mara khabili mumulilo. “
Mana ababii balia balireeba mbu: “kabeele karie akhulalolanga Abandu bakhwabalilanga mubabii mumulilo kuno?”
Koo khwababayila nohomba tsimoni tsiefu nitsilalolanga
Toto kano okhusolana khuno khwa Abandu bomumuliro nitoto
Boola mbu: “esie endisa Omwikanyilisi, ne abulaho Nyasaye wundi owulali Nyasaye mulala Owamani muno. ”
Nyasaye welikulu nende eshialo nende bili hakari wabio Owamaani muno, Omunji weshileshelo
Boola kano ni amacheni amakhongo muno aka enywe mukhayanga
Ka enywe mubula ninako oluchendo. [enywe nanyu mukakhayanga]
Shindali nende obumanyi kebilonje ebikhongo bioluyali olwabiayingananga
Ndahebwa obufimbuli shichila esie endi Omwikanyilisi Owabulafu
Olwa Nyasaye wuwo yaboolela Abamalaika mbu: “esie enonjele Omundu okhurula khuliloba.”
Kho olwandalamukasia mana emufuramwo omwoyo okhurulana ninasi kho mumwinamile khukhumuwulila
Abamalaika boosi nibeenama- halala
Halali Iblisi yaba Omufuru mana naba mubakhayi
Nyasaye namureeba mbu ; “Ewe Iblis shina shikhukayiile okhwinamila khushienonjele nende emikhono chianje, ofurire nohomba oli mubakhongo?”
Shetani naboola ‘Esie endi omulayi okhumushila ye, waloonga esie okhurulana khu muliro naye nomulonga okhurula khuliloba.”
Nyasaye namuboolela mbu: “’mana rula muno ewe oli neshitsubo.”
Ne eshitsubo shianje shikhulikhwo okhula inyanga yomurungo
Iblis naboola: ‘Nyasaye wanje mbelesie obwiyangu ndalafwa tawe okhula inyanga yokhulamusibwa mubafu
Nyasaye namuboolela; ‘‘mana ekhuhelesiyie obwiyangu.’’
Okhula khubise bieyinyanga imanyishe
Iblis naboola mbu: ‘‘nditsuba khumaani koko toto nditsa okhukosia boosi [Abana ba Adam]”
Halali Abasumba bobo abatswenufu mubo
Nyasaye naboola mbu “Toto, ne emboola obwatoto
Ndiliitsusia Jahanam khu ewe nende balia boosi balikhuloonda mubo.”
Boola mbu “ esie shebareba omurungo kwosikwosi tawe nohomba esie shendi omunichilisia tawe
Kano ni ametsulisio butswa Khubandu
Ne toto mulamanya amacheni kaye ahambi hano
Okhwishibwa khweshitabu shino khurulana nende Nyasaye Owamani Owamachesi muno
Toto efwe khwakhwishilia eshitabu shino khubwatoto, kho mulaame Nyasaye yenyene mubutswenufu khu Dini yiyie butswa

Toto Idini yabwene ni ya Nyasaye butswa, ne balia abeliindanga khu ulali Nyasaye nibaboola mbu: “ shikhubalamaanga tawe halali bakhusitie ahambi nende Nyasaye,” toto Nyasaye alibakabula khu kalia akabawukhananga. Toto Nyasaye shaluunjisinjia omubeeyi omukhayi tawe
Nyasaye yenyanga okhuba nende Omwana yakhaloboole mubiloonje bibie owayenya, oluyali ni olulwe, niye Nyasaye mulala ukholanga liayenya

Yaloonga likulu nende eshialo khubwatoto, ufuunikhanga eshiloo khushiteere, nende eshiteere khushiloo, mana nakhola eliuba nende omwesi mubiikhonyele , bioosi bichendanga khubise biarebwaho, manye mbu niye Owa amani Omulesheli muno

Yaloonga okhurula Khumundu mulala, mana namurusiamwo owashie, mana nabarerera ebiruche ebisatsa nende ebikhasi tsimbia munane, abaloonganga mutsinda tsia banyinenywe oshiloonje okhutsia khushindi, mubiilima bitaru. Oyo niye Nyasaye Omulesi wenyu, obwami nobubwe, abulaho Nyasaye wundi owulali ye tawe, kho nanyu mulinjibungwa heena

Ni mukhaya toto Nyasaye ni omuyinda khwinywe, ne shachamilanga Abasumba bebe obukhayi tawe, ne nimumwitsoomia alabafuchilila ne Omundu shalichinga obusiro bwo owashie tawe, mana mulikalukha ewa Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi, ne alibaboolela akamwakholanga toto ye ni Omumanyi muno khukali mubilifi

Ne Omundu nanyoola amasila kosikosi asaba Nyasaye wuwe namukalushila, ne namuhelesia tsimbabaasi okhurula ewuwe yebilila akayasabanga imbeli mana natsokasia Nyasaye nende Abanyasaye bandi mbu kho akosie Abandu khu injila yiye, wikhoye nende obukhayi bubwo hatiti, toto ewe oli mubaandu bomumulilo

Koo ulia ulaamanga eshilo Nyasaye wuwe niyeema niyenama mana naba noburi khu inyanga imalilishi, ne nasuubila okhunyoola tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwe. Boola mbu:“ bakhaba nashilala abamanyile nende abalamanyile tawe, toto abachesi nibobetsulilanga.’’

Boola enywe Abasumba banje basuubila, murie Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi, balia bakhola amalayi khushialo khuno balinyoola amalayi, ne eshialo shia Nyasaye neshiyaangufu, toto abesumilisi balihebwa omurungo kwabu okhubura eshichelo
Boola mbu: “esie ndalomesibwa okhulaama Nyasaye mubutswenufu
Ne ndalomesibwa okhuba weyimbeli mubasalamu
Boola mbu: “ esie eritsaanga eshinyasio shie inyanga ikhongo nekhaya okhuloonda ka Nyasaye Omulesi wanje.”
Ni Nyasaye butswa wenaamanga nemutswenushila
Kho lame shia mwenya owulali Ye. Boola mbu: “toto balia abatiba mana nibatibia emioyo chiabu inyanga yeyindukho,” koo manye mbu, okho nikho okhutiba khwa habulafu
Baliba nende ebichelo biomulilo biawukhane hekulu nende hasi wabu, endio nilwa Nyasaye arisia Abandu bebe, enywe abasumba banje muurie
Ne balia basita ehale khubulaami bwobukori mana nibamukalushila Nyasaye, basuubisibwa obulayi imbeli wa Nyasaye , subisia Abasumba banje
Balia bawulilanga likhuwa mana nibaloonda lilia lilayi lialio, abo nibo ba Nyasaye yalunjisia, ne abo nibo bamachesi
Ne ulia okhoyeshele okhunyoola omurungo kweshinyasio, ewe olinobunyali bwokhuhabina uli mumulilo
Halali balia baria Nyasaye wabu balinyoola tsigorofa ebikoro biombakhwa hekulu webindi, emialo chiburanga hasi wabio, indache ya Nyasaye ne Nyasaye shanyala okhwima shiayakhulaka tawe

Koo shololangakhwo shinga Nyasaye yeshinjia amaatsi okhurula mwikulu, mana nakabusia mutsindoto mwiloba, mana namesilia emimela chikabukhane obukondo, mana chiume chikalukhane chibe namabuyu, mana achikhole amasakaria , toto mu ako khulimwo nende eshitsulisio khubandu bamachesi

Koo ulia wa Nyasaye yafungula eshilifu shishie khubuisilamu, mana naba mubulafu bururulanga ewa Nyasaye Omulesi ( bakhaba nashilala nende ulia womwoyo omumu?) eshinyasio eshikhongo shili khubemioyo emiumu chaletsulilanga Nyasaye, abo bali mubukori obwa habulafu

Nyasaye yeshia amakhuwa amalayi muno , eshitabu shietsinyaali tsifwanana tsiakalushilwa, tsirenjinjia emibili chia balia abaria Nyasaye wabu Omulesi, mana nitsikololosia emibili chiabu nende emioyo chiabu khukhwitsulila Nyasaye, obo nibo obulunjifu bwa Nyasaye alunjisinjia khubwo owayenya, ne owa Nyasaye alekha abulaho umulunjisia
Koo ulia wo bweni bubwe bulibukanana nende eshinyasio eshibii inyanga yeyindukho (aliba nashilala nende abalayi?) mana ababii baliboolelwa mbu: “ pile kalia kamwakholanga.”
Bakhaya balia abali imbeli wabu mana eshinyasio nishibetsela munjila yabalamanyile tawe
Mana Nyasaye nabakhofia eshinyasio shiobuteshele, ne eshinyasio shieyinyanga yeyindukho neshikhongo muno, bamanyanga khwo
Ne toto khwachelasilia Abandu mu Kurani ino buli imbia yamachelasio kho banyoole okhwitsulila
Ikurani yolwarabu ibulamwo tsingatsio khobanyoole okhuria Nyasaye

Nyasaye achelasia Omundu uli nende Abaami bakholelanga halala basolananga, nende Omundu uli nende Omwami mulala, koo bakhaba nashilala? Oluyali lwoosi nilwa Nyasaye, halali obunji bwabu shibamanyile tawe
Toto ewe olifwa nabo boosi balifwa
Mana toto enywe imbeli wa Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi mulisoolana, inyanga yeyindukho
